ModMetaData.name: Dispensary Mod
ModMetaData.author: Firestarme
ModMetaData.description:
1.4.1.0 [04-10-23]
Adds a Dispensary building that helps you control access to drugs. Also adds a door that can limit access with respect to drug policy.
[Changelog]
###################### 1.4.1.0 [04-10-23] ---------------------- Inital Release (for rimworld 1.4)
######################
